author: Tolly Wright
title: Women Wore Handmaid’s Tale Red Robes to Oppose New Abortion Legislation in the Texas Senate
text: Sure, the buzz around Hulu’s The Handmaid’s Tale is palpable , but the women wearing the story’s red robes and white bonnets to the Texas Senate Gallery were probably not just cosplaying as their favorite literary character. On Monday, the Texas Senate was making moves on... More »
